text: NGC 4316 is an edge-on spiral galaxy located about 70 million light-years away in the constellation Virgo. It was discovered by astronomer Wilhelm Tempel on March 17, 1882. NGC 4316 is a member of the Virgo Cluster and is classified as LINER and as a Seyfert galaxy. The galaxy has undergone ram-pressure stripping in the past. ==SN 2003bk== On February 28, 2003 a type II supernova known as SN 2003bk was discovered in NGC 4316. ==See also== * List of NGC objects (4001–5000) ==References== ==External links== 4316 040119 Category:Virgo (constellation) Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1882 Category:Spiral galaxies 07447 Category:Virgo Cluster Category:LINER galaxies Category:Seyfert galaxies
title: NGC 4316
